text: <@U6303RULB> interesting request regarding #106, it's got me thinking about how we could add maybe some sort of adapter similar to how requests uses http adapters. text: and re the inplay, inplay markets have the 5s delay, so if using requests your python thread will hang waiting 5s for a response on an order insert (if you arent using the async / return immediately flag in betfair)

elements.text: and re the inplay, inplay markets have the 5s delay, so if using requests your python thread will hang waiting 5s for a response on an order insert (if you arent using the async / return immediately flag in betfair)
